CustomField.description: This field is optional and auto-populates. The field indicates the amount of lendable value available after any pledges and/or liens have been accounted for on the piece of collateral. The value of the field is calculated in this way: Lendable Value - (Total Lien Amount - Total Excluded Lien Amount) - (Total Pledge Amount - Total Excluded Pledge Amount).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The amount of lendable value available after any pledges and/or liens have been accounted for on this piece of collateral.
CustomField.label: Available Lendable Value
